attributes.action: Rescind Shami Chakrabati's title given the admission of anti Semitism in Labour
attributes.additional_details: There was a demonstration outside Parliament with MPs of all parties taking part stating #Enough is Enough#
attributes.background: She was given the title by the labour leader for her investigation into Anti Semitism in the labour party which she concluded didn't exist. Now this week we have had many examples of it and the Labour Leader Jeremy Corbyn has admitted it exists and has apologised to the Board of Deputies
